name: Userstyles.org Pimped
description:
** Currently outdated. Doesn't work with the recent changes to the site. **

Facelift for Userstyles.org!
Designed to make the site consistent with the look & feel of the forums (Vanillaforums).

** WORK IN PROGRESS ** (So check back for updates)


 C H A N G E L O G

0.3 - 04 Feb 2011
 - Added Styling for the User Page(Icons for actions when logged in).
 - Added/Updated Styling for more elements on the Style Page.
 - Changed color for Install Box on Style page.
 - Different matching icons for the Style Table.

0.2 - 30 Jan 2011
 - Added styling for elements on the Style Page(install box, meta data, description, code etc..)
 - Added styling for Home page.
 - Added styling for code & blockquote on Forums.

0.1 - 27 Jan 2011
 - Initial release.
